meta.article_title: January 9, 2012 - Proper Care of Your Racket

debutant.nom: Cleaning with plain water and towel
debutant.description: Wet a corner of the towel, wipe the surface, then wipe dry with the rest of the towel.

intermediaire.description: Spray rubber cleaner on the surface, wipe with a towel.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Breathing on the racket and wiping with towel
exercices_complementaires.description: Blow on the surface, then wipe it off with a towel.
Blow on the surface, then wipe it off with the palm of the hand or clothes.

metriques_progression.description: Regularly clean the surface during a playing session.

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Keep your racket covered when not in use to prevent deterioration.

erreurs_a_eviter.nom: Exposing the racket to cold temperatures
erreurs_a_eviter.description: Keep your racket inside the car or with you on a cold day to prevent damage.
